Message:
Several years have passed,
but the two of us are still here...

Thanks to the nun who took us
into her church back then.

The church was full of
young children,
and as we looked after them,

“Nebra, I guess the two of us
are everyone’s leaders now, huh?
And this proves it.”

Lucille snapped
her necklace in two,
and handed me a half.
We then pushed
our halves together,
forming a whole.

This necklace is like a symbol
of our vow to each other...
I couldn’t be happier...

I’m sure the two of us will be
together like this forever...

“Let’s save witches
from the clutches of humans.”

One day, Lucille tried to
leave the church,
with only witches in tow.

“Lucille, wait...!
Humans aren’t our enemies.
All of us can live as one...!”

But, the hand
I extended towards her
was only smacked away,
before she left the church
for good.
